name: Feedoptimise
author: Feedoptimise

sections.description: WooCommerce connector allowing you to sync items in your store with your Feedoptimise account where you can create feeds for any channels including Google Shopping, Facebook Product Ads and Shops, Instagram, Bing Shopping, Amazon and more.
sections.installation:
1. Upload the Feedoptimise plugin directory into your /wp-content/plugins/ directory
  2. Activate the plugin through the ‘Plugins’ menu in WordPress
  3. Get your Feedoptimise Customer ID.
  4. In the WordPress admin panel go to settings and then click on Feedoptimise. Please enter your Customer ID under Customer ID field.
  5. Delete the cache on your server and on your browser.
sections.faq:
How do I check if the plugin is working properly?

You need to have an active account at Feedoptimise in order to use this plugin, you can find out more at www.feedoptimise.com.

Where can I report a bug or suggest improvements?

Please contact us.

short_description: WooCommerce extension enabling direct integration with feedoptimise.com services.
description: WooCommerce connector allowing you to sync items in your store with your Feedoptimise account where you can create feeds for any channels including Google Shopping, Facebook Product Ads and Shops, Instagram, Bing Shopping, Amazon and more.
